thread.title: Standard Chartered pulls out of giant coal project in Australia
thread.title_full: Standard Chartered pulls out of giant coal project in Australia

title: Standard Chartered pulls out of giant coal project in Australia
text:
End date Standard Chartered pulls out of giant coal project in Australia 
Standard Chartered has ceased its involvement with the controversial Carmichael coal mine in Australia, following a court ruling that overturned the Canberra government's approval of the project. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
